attributes.action: Institute a time limit on claiming dole money and benefits in which to find a job.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that, rather than allowing people to continually recieve benefits while contributing nothing to society, we should institute a time limit, in which benefits should be made availible, however should the time limit run out and those abusing the system have still not found a job, these benefits will be revoked. It seems unfair that some should work to live, only to pay for others to live without work.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
